snippet.title: Preparing my 3D Exploration Game for Release | Devlog | Episode 4
snippet.description:
#3d #devlog #steamgame #releasedate #explorationgames 

In this video, I will be preparing Seven Days for release on Steam. I will also be talking about the status of the game.

This is a series of videos about a 3D Exploration game I am making. A new devlog will be released every 4-5 days. Stay tuned for the next one.
==========
Wishlist the game! - https://store.steampowered.com/app/2144320/Seven_Days/

Game Website - https://sevendays.ideaclay.com
==========
SUBSCRIBE to Manas Joshi: https://www.youtube.com/ManasJoshi

Follow me @
Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/monteboombox

Check out my Website: https://monteboombox.github.io/manas-joshi

Check out my games on Itch.io: https://monteboombox.itch.io

Play my game Moon Ground: https://monteboombox.itch.io/moon-ground
Play my game Healthy Warrior: https://monteboombox.itch.io/healthy-warrior
Play my game Hexagone Mad: https://monteboombox.itch.io/hexagone-mad
Play my game Terminal Hacker: https://monteboombox.itch.io/terminal-hacker
Get FREE 2D Survival Game Assets: https://monteboombox.itch.io/survival-2d-video-game-weapon-assets

About Me:
Hi there! I am Manas Joshi aka MonteBoomBox. I am a Web & Game Developer. I love to create video games which people would want to play!
